articles.title: Great American Family to unleash 18 new Christmas movies — see the schedule
articles.description: Full House vets Candace Cameron Bure and Andrea Barber are among the stars on the network's Yuletide slide, plus the gift of Gladys Knight.
articles.content: Great American Family isn't taking very long to transform itself into a Christmas-movie factory. The cable network (which happens to be run by former Hallmark Channel chief Bill Abbott) announced on … [+9441 chars]

articles.title: 9 of the best Halloween movies to stream on Starz
articles.description: Celebrate spooky season with the best Halloween movies streaming on Starz, from true terrors to family-friendly favorites.
articles.content: Spooky season is all around, but the fear is all in your head in Silent House, a 2011 independent psychological horror film starring Elizabeth Olsen. Based on the 2010 Uruguayan film La Casa Muda, Si… [+399 chars]

articles.title: Best Action Movies on Netflix Right Now (September 2022) - IGN
articles.description: These are the best action movies on Netflix right now -- blockbusters, fight films, animated adventures and shootouts galore.
articles.content: There is nothing like a good action movie on Netflix. The perfectly choreographed fight scenes that let you feel every punch and kick on screen; the shootouts that see bullets and bodies hitting the … [+11394 chars]
